interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Castelbel Porto Tropical Garden Luxury Bath Bar 10.5 Oz Gift Wrapped
Review Date: 2016/01/06
Store: Castelbel Porto
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.6 x 1.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '737488213553'}
Review Text: I bought this bar as a Christmas gift for a relative..I have used this brand in the past. The packaging is rather fancy but the scents are so delicious . They remind me of cocktails they serve in the Hawaiian islands..The bars are a full size 10.5 oz and you can share these with a male spouse. Most male's tend to avoid scented soaps especially if they linger? To bad I didn't buy this one for myself but my cousin should enjoy this soap. Maybe she will return the favor and buy me the same brand? Lol
Review Title: Taking a cruise...in the Hawaiian islands
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Savon de Marseille, Jasmine fragrance, 5.3 Oz Bar soap, Marius Fabre
Marius Fabre
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Marius Fabre', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '5.3 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HB150JA'}
The bar is rather small..but the jasmine is overly pungent! In a good way..I'm wondering could it be chemically enhanced? Most jasmine's are rather light in nature. Regardless this bar is for a special occasion like my birthday 2015
blooms in jasmine
Optimum Salon Haircare Damage Antidote Oil Moisturizer 8.5 oz
Soft-Sheen Carson
{'Material Type Free': 'Aluminum Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Soft-Sheen Carson', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.5 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332133307 796433040804 075285008492 784190441354'}
I bought this product last year in 2014 at a local CVS pharmacy store. I like this product but I must warn African females (black) this product does leave a residue..so if you use this lotion daily..always brush your hair out. From the scalp to the ends...it reminds me of the "jerri curl" products from the 1980's. Over all my hair did not dry out and it stayed moisturized for atleast 2-3 before re-applying. If you use a pressing comb or hot curling iron dont mix this product with heat..if you desire a Donna Summers look this is perfect..
Better than a perm any day..
Venezia Soapworks Moisturizing Soap Rose - 7oz
Venezia
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Venezia', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '796433748755 895697010100 787461525142'}
This bar I purchased because I wanted to collect a rose scented bar from this company. When I'm in a mood for "florals" I scan amazon for certain scents of soaps. The reviews were reasonable regarding this brand. Only time will tell will I repeat my purchase.
A little piece of italy...I think?
Asquith & Somerset ROSE GARDEN 10.5 Oz Perfumed Bath Soap, Gift Wrapped, imported from England
Asquith & Somerset
{'Brand': 'Asquith & Somerset', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.7 x 1.4 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '784179663692'}
I have used Asquith & Somerset bath products since 2010. Top tier luxury soap makers along side Caswell & Massey. This bar was purchased as a gift for a relative.
Royalty...
Calgon Massaging Beauty Bar - English Garden: 2 Bars
Calgon
["CALGON take me away! Wrap your skin in luxury with these unique beauty bars specifically formulated to cleanse, nourish and massage the skin with hydrating lotion. The creamy lather leaves skin soft, smooth and clean while the massage bumps help exfoliate and improve body's micro-circulation. Skin feels refreshed and moisturized all day long. Discover English Garden: A romantic bouquet of flowers that captures the essence of moonlit strolls in a lush, enchanted garden. 2 - 4.25 OZ ("]
{'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Calgon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.8 x 2.8 x 3 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '815890010103', 'UPC': '815890010103', 'Manufacturer': 'Calgon'}
I love Calgon bath products...the scents are delicious and you feel like you've died & gone to heaven. The soaps are very creamy and leave you squeeky clean.
Calgon ....!
Michel Design Works Bath Soap Bar, Peony, Large
Michel Design Works
['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.']
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 3 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL227', 'UPC': '608666691299', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'}
I purchased the Hummingbird scent and I currently own three scents from Michel.. The Peony is really a good scent and the scent is just wonderful. The bars are really big and the lather is just infectious so I recommend that you buy a bar for bathing. You can also give one of these as a gift if you so choose? My Tutti Fruiti arrived today as well and the smell is another top favorite..
Michel Design works really does a body good
Bundle of 2 Greenwich Bay Trading Co. Soaps - 10.5oz Bath Soap Bar and Matching 1.9oz Hand Soap Bar (Passion Flower and Olive Oil)
Greenwich Bay Trading Company
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Greenwich Bay Trading Company', 'Unit Count': '12.4 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 4 x 3 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332243488 617633902047'}
What more can I say about my purchase of Greenwich Bay Trading bath bar set? First of all these soap sets were on my Wish-list for sometime. They arrived today and just like they are pictured...The big bar is truly huge..! Reminds me of a container of butter that you find in the super market. The scents are very nice and they arrived un broken or switched out due to a shortage in shipping. The larger bar I will use sometime next year and the smaller one will go in my soap bowl,that I plan on using this weekend.
Finally sitting on the dock of the Bay..
Commonwealth Argan Oil Moisturizing Bath Bar 12 Oz Boxed by CST
Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1'}
I bought this bar of soap as a gift for my hair stylist and I have used Common Wealth bar soaps in the past. They normally keep them at hotels like Marriot,Hilton or other 3 star lodge's. I purchased  a Cotton,Pineapple from Amazon and the Sugar scented one's from their company website...The bars are really big and they last for more than a month or more. They make a wonderful gift and certain scent's have a special box that encases the soaps..
A gift...in deed
Castelbel Porto Tropical Garden Luxury Bath Bar 10.5 Oz Gift Wrapped
Castelbel Porto
{'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.6 x 1.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '737488213553'}
I bought this bar as a Christmas gift for a relative..I have used this brand in the past. The packaging is rather fancy but the scents are so delicious . They remind me of cocktails they serve in the Hawaiian islands..The bars are a full size 10.5 oz and you can share these with a male spouse. Most male's tend to avoid scented soaps especially if they linger? To bad I didn't buy this one for myself but my cousin should enjoy this soap. Maybe she will return the favor and buy me the same brand? Lol
Taking a cruise...in the Hawaiian islands
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for floral scents, now complemented by an appreciation for tropical and exotic aromas reminiscent of cocktails in tropical locales. Their recent interaction reinforces a desire for enchanting olfactory experiences that transport them to vibrant, festive settings.

- **Product Form:** Loyalty to bar soaps continues, emphasizing the value of traditional, high-quality personal care products. The user enjoys the luxurious tactile experience that comes with larger soap bars, ideal for both personal use and gifting.

- **Context of Use:** The user seeks effective, indulgent products for everyday use and special occasions, valuing items that enhance skin health while providing a sensory escape. 

- **Brand Affinity:** They favor reputable, well-reviewed brands, demonstrating a conscientious approach to personal care. Their experience with various quality options shows a consistent alignment with brands that uphold high standards.

- **Product Evaluation:** The user consistently rates products highly, indicating a discerning taste for luxury items that enhance their bath experience, including scents that linger without being overwhelming. 

- **Sensory Experience:** There is a continued enthusiasm for rich sensory encounters, showcasing a preference for lasting aromas and creamy textures. They appreciate visually appealing packaging, which enhances their purchasing decisions for themselves and thoughtful gift-giving.

Overall, the user seeks high-quality, luxurious personal care products, with an emphasis on floral and exotic fragrances, while maintaining a focus on effective, distinctive options that elevate their daily routine.
